Class NetworkFactory

java.lang.Object
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.engine.network.NetworkFactory
public class NetworkFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating AbstractNetwork instances.

This class decides at runtime whether to create a file-based network (FileBasedEndToEndNetwork) or a randomly generated network (RandomEndToEndNetwork) based on configuration properties.

If the configuration property net.sampler.file is defined, a FileBasedEndToEndNetwork is created using the specified file path. Otherwise, a RandomEndToEndNetwork is created using the provided Sampler.

Author:
Sotirios Liaskos for the Conceptual Modeling Group @ York University

  • Method Details

    • createNetwork

      public static AbstractNetwork createNetwork(NodeSet ns, Sampler sampler)
      Creates an AbstractNetwork instance based on configuration.

      This method first attempts to create a file-based network if the configuration property net.sampler.file exists. If not, it creates a random network using the provided Sampler.

      Parameters:
      ns - the NodeSet representing nodes in the network
      sampler - the Sampler used for generating random throughput values if needed
      Returns:
      an AbstractNetwork instance (either file-based or random)
